name: amdld
description: AMD module loader with deterministic and just-in time module initialization
author: Rasmus Andersson <me@rsms.me>

scripts.test: node test/test.js && !(which tsc >/dev/null) || (/bin/echo -n 'testing TypeScript... ' && tsc test/tstest.ts && node test/tstest.js && echo ok)
scripts.build: java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --compilation_level ADVANCED --env BROWSER --js_output_file amdld.min.js --output_wrapper '(function(){%output%}).call(this);' --language_out ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --create_source_map amdld.min.js.map amdld.js
scripts.build-pretty: java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --formatting PRETTY_PRINT --compilation_level ADVANCED --env BROWSER --js_output_file amdld.min-pretty.js --output_wrapper '(function(){%output%}).call(this);' --language_out ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --create_source_map amdld.min.js.map amdld.js
scripts.postinstall: if (which java >/dev/null) && [ -f node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar ]; then npm run build; fi
